tv.generator-info-name: WebGrab+Plus/w MDB & REX Postprocess -- version V5.3.0.0 -- Jan van Straaten

programme.title: JAG: Dangerous Game
programme.desc: A deputy sheriff dies while chasing a car carrying two SEALs in a Navy exercise. The driver stands trial for negligent homicide.(n)

programme.title: JAG: In Thin Air
programme.desc: Lt. Albrecht and Lt. Cmdr. Zuzello make Zuzello’s farewell flight before he retires. All is fine until Albrecht notices that his partner is passed out from hypoxia. Albrecht makes an emergency landing on the ship.Harm is sent to the ship to investigate.(n)

programme.title: JAG: Need to Know
programme.desc: As a favor from Congresswoman Lillian Dorning, SECNAV Sheffield asks the JAG staff to get the story of a submarine, USS Angel Shark (SSGN-559), which was lost on a CIA mission in 1968.(n)

programme.title: JAG: Friendly Fire
programme.desc: Harm serves as a judge and Mac is the contentious prosecutor in a case fraught withpolitical implications when an American aviator is charged with killing three Britishsoldiers during a flight mission in Afghanistan.(n)

programme.title: JAG: Shifting Sands
programme.desc: When a Gulf War MIA victim is found as the sheik’s wife in a nomadic Arab tribe, Bud prosecutes and Mac defends her against charges of desertion and, in a stunning turn of events, treason. Harm tries to get his old job back but is turned away.(n)

programme.title: Scorpion: Kill Screen
programme.desc: Team Scorpion must help Ralph when the FBI questions him after his dark web game play inadvertently reveals the location of a CIA safe house and results in the murder of CIA operatives.(n)

programme.title: Scorpion: Charades
programme.desc: Team Scorpion is tasked with uncovering a mole inside the CIA whose judgment is clouded by matters of the heart and is being coerced into stealing deadly chemicals.(n)

programme.title: Scorpion: Forget Me Nots
programme.desc: Team Scorpion must jog the memory of an injured former Secret Service agent who is their only hope of preventing weapons of mass destruction being launched from a secret U.S. nuclear silo.(n)

programme.title: Scorpion: Love Boat
programme.desc: Team Scorpion goes undercover on a cruise ship to locate and disable deadly stolen rockets.(n)

programme.title: Scorpion: Going South
programme.desc: Team Scorpion heads to Mexico when a tech billionaire hires them to rescue his kidnapped daughter.(n)

programme.title: Scorpion: Once Bitten, Twice Die
programme.desc: When a conflict in Eastern Europe threatens to escalate, Team Scorpion is called on to help facilitate secret peace talks to prevent World War III.(n)

programme.title: Rookie Blue: Going Under
programme.desc: When 15 Division goes undercover at a club-land bar that’s a possible hub for illegal handguns, Chris’s erratic behavior and concern for a specific drug dealer make Dov suspicious.(n)

programme.title: Rookie Blue: Two Truths and a Lie
programme.desc: As the officers of 15 Division try to hunt down the killer of Brian Gowdy – Andy and Sam go on the road to interview a list of inmates at Millburn Penitentiary.(n)

programme.title: Rookie Blue: Deal with the Devil
programme.desc: In the midst of a chaotic day at the station, Oliver prepares Andy to defend herself at Duncan’s dismissal hearing, now happening two hours from now.(n)

programme.title: Rookie Blue: Exit Strategy
programme.desc: Chris’s addiction issues come to a head when an innocuous call to a middle-class home puts Dov and Chris in the middle of a suspicious home invasion investigation.(n)

programme.title: Rookie Blue: "Moving Day"
programme.desc: 15 Division is assigned to a community outreach program, “Moving Day”, to help tenants move out of a subsidized-housing complex that’s being torn down.(n)

programme.title: Rookie Blue: Fragments
programme.desc: Andy’s former rookie, Duncan, is back on duty and looking to reconcile – something she’s not ready for yet. But personal feelings get thrust aside when a bomb explodes in a downtown parking garage.(n)

programme.title: Most Haunted: Delapre Abbey
programme.desc: The team are joined by five members of the English rugby team as they investigate an all\nbut forgotten piece of British history.(n)

programme.title: Most Haunted: Drakelow Tunnels
programme.desc: p 8: Drakelow Tunnels - Kidderminster: With over 4 miles of haunted tunnels the team have one night to investigate this labyrinth of horror.(n)

programme.title: Most Haunted: Newton House Part 1
programme.desc: The first of a two-part investigation with celebrity guests, world famous band ‘Bullet for My Valentine’.(n)

programme.title: Most Haunted: Newton House Part 2
programme.desc: Part 2 of this spin-chilling episode. Nursing their wounds from the last episode the team and their celebrity guests ‘Bullet For My Valentine’ carry on.(n)

programme.title: Most Haunted: Royal Court Theatre - Bacup
programme.desc: The world famous ghost hunting team return for a new series and start in a small\ntheatre with a big problem…ghosts.(n)

programme.title: Ghost Hunters: Episode 10
programme.desc: Despite mysterious and unnerving warnings from locals, the Ghost Hunters face their fears and stay on mission: to help people confront terrifying paranormal encounters that have shaken them to their core.(n)

programme.title: Ghost Hunters: A Serial Killer's Revenge
programme.desc: Jason and the TAPS team head to Charleston, South Carolina, one of the most haunted cities in America and winner of Ghost Hunters America's Hometown Ghost Hunt Contest.(n)

programme.title: Ghost Hunters: Sloss Furnaces
programme.desc: On this episode of Ghost Hunters, TAPS travels to Alabama to investigate Sloss Furnaces, a 50-acre industrial plantoperating from 1882 until the 1970s.(n)

programme.title: Ghost Hunters
programme.desc: Despite mysterious and unnerving warnings from locals, the Ghost Hunters face their fears and stay on mission: to help people confront terrifying paranormal encounters that have shaken them to their core.(n)

programme.title: Ghost Hunters: Norwich State
programme.desc: On this episode of Ghost Hunters,TAPS becomes the first paranormal team to be invited to investigate Norwich State Hospital, in Norwich, Connecticut.(n)

programme.title: Andromeda: Soon the Nearing Vortex
programme.desc: Tyr returns, having joined with the Collectors and demands the route of ages from his former crewmates.(n)

programme.title: Andromeda: The World Turns All Around Her
programme.sub-title: The World Turns All Around Her
programme.desc: A hostage situation ensues when the crew confronts Tyr.(n)

programme.title: Andromeda: Conduit to Destiny
programme.desc: A wrong turn in the slipstream leads Andromeda to a prison riot.(n)

programme.title: Andromeda: Machinery of the Mind
programme.desc: The Andromeda crew steps up to find out who killed a group of scientists.(n)

programme.title: Andromeda: Exalted Reason, Resplendent Daughter
programme.desc: The crew is hired to rescue a princess from a notorious outlaw, but it is soon revealed that she was trying to escape murder at her father's hand.(n)

programme.title: Andromeda: The Torment, the Release
programme.desc: The Collectors now control the Commonwealth and put the Andromeda crew on trial.(n)

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.247
programme.desc:
Alleged abuse of a seven-year-old boy, unpaid loans, and shared			
living expenses are disputed by ex-lovers.			
A loan to buy work clothes, a broken lease, and unpaid child			
support come into play when former lovers fight over money.(n)

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.102
programme.desc: A luau-themed birthday party incites a group assault between two sisters and other partygoers; organizers claims the sisters were not originally invited to the party.(n)

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.205
programme.desc: Eighteen-year-old ex-roommates quarrel over a cat fight, the cost to replace a mattress, and vet bills.\t\t\t\r\nA woman sues her niece for a series of loans she says she made to pay for living expenses.(n)

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.162
programme.desc: Teen sues ex-friend for burns and stolen laptop, countersued for harassment. Adult entertainment sued for refund after male dancers disrupt birthday party.(n)

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.235
programme.desc: A woman sues her sister's ex for repossessing a Chevy Yukon; he alleges stolen tags. Exes argue over a bite mark and sue for car damages, a lease, and unpaid vet bills.(n)

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.135
programme.desc: Shady car salesman sacked for BMW lease scam; dealership owner denies fault. Two women brawl over car keying amid infidelity claims against shared ex.(n)

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.95
programme.desc: An intoxicated teenager confesses to urinating in a friend’s yard; she sues her ex-friend for coming to her workplace and telling everyone about it.(n)

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.176
programme.desc: Single mother bails Internet acquaintance out of jail, discovers he has girlfriend and baby. He countersues, alleging she stalked him. Angry neighbor smashes deliveryman's car window with lawn chair for driving too fast.(n)

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.211
programme.desc: Convicted of first-degree assault after an altercation at a bar, a man is sued by his ex-girlfriend who bailed him out of jail.\t\t\t\r\nAn alleged assault between former college dorm mates, a cycle of harassment, and a damaged computer are disputed.(n)

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.111
programme.desc: A woman admits to wielding a knife but not to scratching her ex- stepbrother’s car/A woman demands compensation after a young house sitter allegedly damages her home and belongings when she broke the rules and brought her cat along.(n)

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.117
programme.desc: Jealousy leads to assault and theft at golf course/Sued for damaging car, trip costs, and phone.(n)

programme.title: Hell's Kitchen USA
programme.desc: The remaining chefs cater for 40 `glampers' before a hectic dinner service which leads to a difficult decision for the chefs and Gordon himself. Someone will have to pay the ultimate price and be forced to leave the competition at this late stage.(n)

programme.title: Hell's Kitchen USA
programme.desc: The four remaining chefs are reunited with their loved ones for a taste test, with the winner dining out with their family at a posh restaurant.(n)

programme.title: Hell's Kitchen USA
programme.desc: Gordon's top two feel the pressure as they prepare their final menus. The pair do not have long to ponder and consider whether a simple or more adventurous approach will win the day.(n)

programme.title: Hell's Kitchen USA
programme.desc: Ramsay splits the contestants into two teams along gender lines and asks them to present their signature dishes, with the winning team getting to spend an evening with William Shatner.(n)

programme.title: Hell's Kitchen USA
programme.desc: The men's team get a head start on the first challenge after some successful crab fishing, but can the women edge ahead when it comes to the cooking? Dinner service sees an infuriated Gordon throw an entire team out of the kitchen.(n)

programme.title: Undercover Boss Canada
programme.desc: Lisa Lisson, the first female president of FedEx Express Canada, goes undercover to find out if her employees have the right resources to provide exceptional service in the fiercely competitive courier industry.(n)

programme.title: Undercover Boss Canada
programme.desc: CEO John Tracogna goes undercover at Canada’s largest zoo to get up close and personal with endangered wildlife and the people that keep the organization running.(n)

programme.title: Undercover Boss Canada
programme.desc: Canlan Ice Sports Corp is the largest private owner of sports facilities in North America. CEO Joey St Aubin admits their prices are higher than local municipal rinks, but believes his company offers a premium service and better ice quality.(n)

programme.title: Undercover Boss Canada
programme.desc: Toronto Transit Commission (TTC) City Councillor and TTC Chair Karen Stintz goes undercover inside the country's largest mass transit system to get her hands dirty with some of the toughest and grittiest jobs.(n)

programme.title: Undercover Boss USA
programme.desc: Lynne Zappone, the Chief Talent Officer of Popeye’s Louisiana Kitchen, a restaurant chain that generates more than $2 billion in annual revenue, goes undercover posing as a participant in a reality show called Job Swap.(n)

programme.title: Undercover Boss USA
programme.desc: Harlan Kent is the CEO of the world’s largest candle manufacturer, Yankee Candle. Harlan goes undercover as Dan Johnson, a chef from Cincinnati who was forced to close his restaurant and open up a retail store but has no experience in the field.(n)

programme.title: Operation Repo starts 9pm
programme.desc: STARTS 9PM Take a ride along with Operation Repo! This docudrama series takes an in-depth look at the professional, but sometimes murky world of car repossession. Get ready for the drama!(n)

programme.title: Operation Repo starts 9pm
programme.desc: STARTS 9PM Take a ride along with Operation Repo! This docudrama series takes an in-depth look at the professional, but sometimes murky world of car repossession. Get ready for the drama!(n)

programme.desc: STARTS 9PM Take a ride along with Operation Repo! This docudrama series takes an in-depth look at the professional, but sometimes murky world of car repossession. Get ready for the drama!(n)

programme.desc: STARTS 9PM Take a ride along with Operation Repo! This docudrama series takes an in-depth look at the professional, but sometimes murky world of car repossession. Get ready for the drama!(n)

programme.desc: STARTS 9PM Take a ride along with Operation Repo! This docudrama series takes an in-depth look at the professional, but sometimes murky world of car repossession. Get ready for the drama!(n)

programme.desc: STARTS 9PM Take a ride along with Operation Repo! This docudrama series takes an in-depth look at the professional, but sometimes murky world of car repossession. Get ready for the drama!(n)

programme.desc: STARTS 9PM Take a ride along with Operation Repo! This docudrama series takes an in-depth look at the professional, but sometimes murky world of car repossession. Get ready for the drama!(n)

programme.title: Operation Repo starts 9pm
programme.desc: STARTS 9PM Take a ride along with Operation Repo! This docudrama series takes an in-depth look at the professional, but sometimes murky world of car repossession. Get ready for the drama!(n)

programme.title: Operation Repo starts 9pm
programme.desc: STARTS 9PM Take a ride along with Operation Repo! This docudrama series takes an in-depth look at the professional, but sometimes murky world of car repossession. Get ready for the drama!(n)

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: A Big Bust
programme.desc: Audrey believes her maid needs an operation to correct the limp she has to be able to walk better, thinking she is doing the right thing Audrey asks her neighbors to contribute to the cause not having any idea what the money is really intended for.(n)

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: After The Lovin'
programme.desc: Frustrated by his boss blaming him for burning his mouth on hot soup, Timmy has a special spoon created for Russell. Audrey's plan backfires when she tries to seduce Jeff in the bedroom in order to get him to complete household tasks.(n)

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: Missed Connections
programme.desc: Timmy wants to reconnect with a woman he met on the subway; Jeff and Audrey turn on each other when former friends snub them.(n)

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: The Five Things
programme.desc: Jeff can't think of five nice things to say about Audrey; Russell encourages Timmy to serenade a woman; Jennifer and Adam mistakenly get Jeff and Audrey's bank statement.(n)

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: Meat Wars
programme.desc: Audrey drags Jen to a Bon Jovi concert to prove that she's still young and fun, leaving Jeff and Adam at home. Russell finds a phone number in his pocket and asks Timmy to investigate.(n)

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: Goodbye Dolly
programme.desc: Audrey tries to prepare for motherhood by continuing to repair a doll that she keeps damaging. Meanwhile, Jeff questions whether the very pregnant Brenda should be dating anymore, and Adam tries to convince Jennifer that he is a manly man.(n)

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: Audrey's Shower
programme.desc: Jen puts the wrong date on the invitations to Audrey's baby shower, Jeff likes Audrey's maternity clothes, and Russell gives up women.(n)

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: Liz Moves In
programme.desc: Liz temporarily moves in with Jeff and Audrey. Jeff isn't happy with the new guest, but changes his mind when he discovers Liz consistently takes his side against Audrey.(n)

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: Taking Names
programme.desc: Jeff and Audrey realize that the names on their baby list are also the names of women that Russell has slept with. Adam becomes a cycling enthusiast after Jennifer suggests they start riding bikes in the park.(n)

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: Cats & Dogs
programme.desc: Feeling lonely after her cat dies, Liz looks for a sperm donor. When Timmy's intellect and innocence don't attract his crush, he tries his hand at playing 'big dog.' Adam rips the vintage wedding dress that Jennifer's family sent her.(n)

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: A Family Affair
programme.desc: Dog likes to say, "The apple doesn't fall far from the tree," and this is a hunt where that is true. So will Dog be able to use one family member's troubled ways to catch another one in trouble with the law?(n)

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Bait and Switch
programme.desc: Things are seldom what they seem in the world of bounty hunting. When the fugitive's girlfriend offers to help Dog trap this dangerous felon, Dog knows that someone is being deceived. The only question is, whom?(n)

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Running on Empty
programme.desc: Dog's time is running out in Colorado. After a month of helping his bail bondsmen friends around Denver, he's got to get his family back home to Hawaii. But Dog wants one more capture before they leave.(n)

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: The Smackdown of Baby Lyssa
programme.desc: After meeting with the cosigner on a bond for a man named John, Dog and the Posse hatch a plan to lure him to a high rise apartment. But when night falls, their plan leaves a member of the team alone and in harm's way!(n)

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Father-Hood
programme.desc: Before Tim heads out for a tough day of bounty hunting, he likes to get in a little quality time with his daughter, Summer Rain.(n)

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Girl Trouble
programme.desc: Dog and the team have girl trouble in this case. Krystal jumped bail and seems to have vanished into the high plains of Colorado. To make matters worse, she's running with her lover (and bond co-signer) Carrie. But Thelma and Louise they ain't.(n)

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Double Trouble
programme.desc: Dog's feeling lucky, so he's going to try to capture two women in one day. The first, Moani, has "crazy" tattooed on her neck and is facing drug charges. The second fugitive, Jade, who turns out to be a tough catch, despite help from Jade's sister.(n)

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Surface Scratches
programme.desc: Dog's latest quarry is running from abuse and assault charges. As Dog investigates, he discovers that this fugitive has gamed the system by jumping from one bond, and one bondsman, to another.(n)

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Carpnado
programme.desc: Jumping Asian carp have invaded Monroe's waters so Jase and the guys set out to try to stop them from spreading further. Meanwhile, Willie and Si have to run Willie's Duck Diner for the day.(n)

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: The Campfire Diaries
programme.desc: The family spends a weekend at their childhood summer camp, reliving old memories and working to repair a tennis court Willie built twenty years ago. While at the camp, Jep tries to pass a lifeguard swimming test he failed as a teenager.(n)

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Rowdy's Big Day
programme.desc: Rowdy's adoption is finalized and he officially becomes a Robertson. Jase gets his first massage and enjoys it more than he expected.(n)

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Disappearing Acts
programme.desc: After Willie and Jase lose Si's tea cup, Si makes them go to great lengths to find it. When the entertainment for Gus's 1st birthday party falls through, Jep fills in as a magician.(n)

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Dance Dads
programme.desc: Willie, Korie, Jase and Missy take dance lessons from Sadie to prepare for Reed and Rebecca's upcoming weddings. Jase's plan to perform Reed's wedding ceremony may fall through when he waits until the last minute to renew his ordainment.(n)

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: End of an Era
programme.desc: When Si decides to retire to pursue a music career, the family organizes a party in his honor. Meanwhile, Willie, Phil, and Jase take a road trip to try to recreate an old duck call for Si's retirement gift.(n)

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Looking Back and Talking Quack
programme.desc: The Robertson family takes a look back at 130 episodes of Duck Dynasty.(n)

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: The Grass & The Furious
programme.desc: It's all hands on deck for the Duckmen when an old high school nemesis challenges them to a good old-fashioned race.(n)

programme.title: Avengers Grimm: Time Wars
programme.desc: An Evil Queen enlists Rumpelstiltskin to help her send the Avengers Grimm back in time. The Avengers will need to work together if they are to return to the present and thwart the Queen before she can carry out her evil plan.(n)

programme.title: Arthur and Merlin (2015)
programme.desc: Inspired by the same Celtic myths that J.R.R. Tolkien (author of The Lord of the Rings trilogy) read as a young man, Arthur & Merlin is an epic fantasy-adventure of good against evil.(n)

programme.title: Meteor Apocalypse
programme.desc: In this End Times thriller, a gigantic meteor enters Earth's orbit and begins to disintegrate, showering the planet in poisonous debris.(n)

programme.title: Knucklehead
programme.desc: After incurring a large debt with a local criminal ringleader, Eddie Sullivan creates a get-rich-quick scheme and enlists a gentle giant named Walter as his unwitting accomplice.(n)

programme.title: The Forger
programme.desc: A teenager wanders into Carmel, California, where he is soon introduced to the art-forgery community.(n)

programme.title: Cybermutt
programme.desc: The powerful dog Rex is injured by a car while rescuing a young scientist from being run over. Feeling responsible for the condition of Rex the scientist uses his skill as a prosthetics inventor to give the dog a new, super-power body.(n)

programme.title: Relative Values
programme.desc: When a star and Hollywood Diva Miranda Frayle brek up, a playboy prince with a stiff upper lip sweeps her off her feet and boldly takes her home to meet his high class society minded mother.(n)

programme.title: The Cannonball Run
programme.desc: The classic comedy with cool stars and even cooler cars! Based on a true race event, Burt Reynolds leads an all-star cast in the ultimate quest to win The Cannonball Run.(n)

programme.title: Rain
programme.desc: Set in 1968, a German Shepherd enrolled by his family in a training program that will send him to serve American soldiers in Vietnam. Even when Rain is wounded, he saves many, and bonds with a soldier who learns much from this very special dog.(n)

programme.title: Jack Hunter: And The Star of Heaven
programme.desc: Jack Hunter realizes the pharaoh's tomb being empty except for a Roman coin means the treasure was looted to Rome but later probably transferred the the new, Byzantine capital, Constantinople.(n)

programme.title: Secret Liaison
programme.desc: One time top public defender returns to LA to try to stop her sister from going to jail for first degree murder, but Samantha also comes face to face with the past she ran away from.(n)

programme.title: Stressed to Death
programme.desc: A former EMT still stricken with PTSD over not being able to save a man's life in time, becomes the target of the victim's wealthy wife who blames her for his death.(n)

programme.title: The Body
programme.desc: A crucified body dated back to the first century A.D is uncovered at an ancient cave in Jerusalem. Trouble ensues as word spreads.(n)

programme.title: Her Boyfriend’s Secret
programme.desc: INSPIRED BY TRUE EVENTS - Renowned interior designer Melissa is drawn into a relationship with a man who has a secret life -- another wife and family. She soon meets another innocent victim and learns her man is more than duplicitous, he’s a killer!(n)

programme.title: Mortdecai
programme.desc: Armed with only his good looks and special charm, an art dealer (Johnny Depp) travels the world to find a stolen painting that is rumored to contain the code to a bank account filled with Nazi gold.(n)

programme.title: Get Smart Again
programme.desc: Maxwell Smart, Agent 99 and their CONTROL colleagues reunite to thwart a KAOS plan to achieve world domination.(n)

programme.title: Killers
programme.desc: A madman forces young friends to kill one another to try to survive a sadistic game.(n)

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: Mark and Milly are shocked when Lucas begins gambling. They don't know that Lucas is "undercover" trying to catch a man cheating.(n)

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: Mark befriends singer-banjoist Lafayette Bly, a blind man with an acute sense of hearing and a very strong grip.(n)

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: A retired lawman's irrational jealousy threatens not only to destroy his marriage but also to make him an easy target for someone who wants him dead.(n)

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: No one is more surprised than Micah when newcomer Leota Carraway claims he's her long-lost husband and the father of her child.(n)

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: Lucas is torn by conflicting emotions when he meets the town's new preacher, a former outlaw whom the Rifleman vowed to kill.(n)

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: The town of North Fork becomes a haven for outlaws when suave Ben Judson smooth-talks his way into the marshal's job.(n)

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: A handsome gambler moves into town and begins wooing Milly Scott, claiming to have known her deceased brother.(n)

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: Lucas develops temporary amnesia from a head injury while visiting a strange town and mistakenly assumes the identity of a wanted criminal.(n)

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: A former neighbor of the McCains' is released from jail after serving his sentence for robbery. Lucas lets the man work for him but the new hand holds a secret.(n)

programme.title: Gracie
programme.desc: A teenager faces an uphill battle when she fights to give women the opportunity to play competitive soccer.(n)

programme.title: An Elephant's Journey
programme.desc: Flora is a circus elephant who can no longer perform her tricks. The night before she's scheduled to be euthanized, the circus owner's 14-year old daughter, Dawn, sneaks Flora from the circus.(n)

programme.title: Mandie and the Secret Tunnel
programme.desc: In 1899, Mandie's life changes when her Cherokee friends help her escape to a mansion that holds the hidden secrets of her past and the key to her future.(n)

programme.title: The Decoy Bride
programme.desc: A heart-warming romantic comedy about an ordinary girl who is hired to be the decoy for the most famous bride in the world.(n)

programme.title: Unicorn City
programme.desc: To prove leadership skills to a potential employer, Voss, a hardcore gamer entices his gamer buddies to create a utopia, but paradise is disrupted when his former nemesis and guild master decides to wage war for the city and the heart of Voss’ true love.(n)

programme.title: 30 Days until I'm Famous
programme.desc: A Latina working in Los Angeles as a messenger is randomly discovered and fashioned into a pop music star.(n)

programme.title: Portrait From Life
programme.desc: An Army Major attempts to find a Jewish girl after seeing her portrait in a London art gallery.(n)

programme.title: The Proud Valley
programme.desc: An African American finds a job in a mining community in Wales, where he wins over the music loving locals with his singing. While there, he shares in the struggles of their lives and fights to improve their working conditions.(n)

programme.title: Rome Express
programme.desc: The theft of a famous painting leads to murder and many suspects on a plush train speeding from Paris to Rome.(n)

programme.title: Band Waggon
programme.desc: A plot involving spies in a haunted castle gives this team of celebrated British wireless comedians plenty of scope for laughs.(n)

programme.title: Quantum Leap
programme.desc: Sam (Scott Bakula) leaps into the life of a woman -- a young competitor in the 1958 Miss Deep South beauty pageant. With Dean Stockwell.(n)

programme.title: Quantum Leap
programme.sub-title: Black on White on Fire - August 11, 1965
programme.desc: Sam (Scott Bakula) finds himself in the middle of the 1965 Watts riots as a black medical student whose white fiancee (Corie Henninger) is taken hostage. Gregory Millar also guest stars.(n)

programme.title: Quantum Leap
programme.desc: Sam (Scott Bakula) leaps into the life of a not-so-successful nightclub magician and single father who is struggling to keep custody of his 12-year-old daughter (Lauren Woodland).(n)

programme.title: Quantum Leap
programme.desc: Sam (Scott Bakula) becomes a 1958 biker who must convince the girlfriend (Josie Bissett) of the gang's leader to leave him before she is killed. With Dean Stockwell.(n)

programme.title: Quantum Leap
programme.desc: On Christmas Eve, Sam (Scott Bakula) has the opportunity to save a center for the homeless from demolition by a ruthless land developer. With Dean Stockwell, Charles Rocket.(n)

programme.title: Starhunter Redux: Order (REDUX)
programme.desc: When a ship of religious cultists commit mass suicide by diving their ship into the sun, the crew rescues a shuttle full of survivors, including the cult leader himself, Brother Thirteen.(n)

programme.title: Relic Hunter: Vampire's Kiss
programme.desc: Lucas Blackmer, a babe-magnet, professor and a novelist asks Sydney to help find Vlad Tepes' lost relic. And he isn't the only one after it.(n)

programme.title: Relic Hunter: Mr. Right
programme.desc: Sydney runs into her ex Gray and goes on a holiday with him to Bali, but when Derek Lloyd shows up to enlist her to find Parvati's Bowl, she can't resist.(n)

programme.title: Relic Hunter: Sydney at Ten
programme.desc: Sydney's roommate from school is on track of a pendant from her past and enlists Sydney to help find it and catch the killer.(n)

programme.title: Relic Hunter: The Light of Truth
programme.desc: Arabia 843 AD: A sheik uses the Light of Truth to reveal his general as a traitor. 2001: Prince Shareem drops out from Sydney's class to go search for the Light of Truth.(n)

programme.title: Relic Hunter: Treasure Island
programme.desc: Sydney's on the hunt for a Pirate's booty, but will a traitor force her to walk the plank?(n)

programme.title: Auction Hunters: Ice, Ice, Baby
programme.desc: Ton and Allen have to get aggressive when they encounter a towering opponent with a mountain of cash. The guys uncover a vintage ice resurfacing machine and an Olympic biathlon rifle!(n)

programme.title: Auction Hunters: The Big Score
programme.desc: At a climate-controlled storage facility in downtown L.A., Allen and Ton's locker wins score them an antique cash register and a German H&K pistol prized by collectors.(n)

programme.title: Auction Hunters: Sin City Shootout
programme.desc: 1953 Chevy-inspired bumper car; scores of M16 30-round magazines; reproduction 1940s boardwalk photobooth; aerosol-powered spud gun potato launchers.(n)

programme.title: Auction Hunters: The Wild West
programme.desc: Allen and Ton explain their strategies at a storage auction in San Bernardino, win two units, then have a Pepperbox gun and vintage Lionel train set appraised by experts.(n)

programme.title: Auction Hunters: Mr. Haff Goes to Washington
programme.desc: Ton and Allen invade the Nation's capital, but meet strong resistance from local bidders. The guys uncover a Civil War era black powder revolver and a stash of South African gold coins!(n)

programme.title: Auction Hunters: Disco and Dice
programme.desc: 1978 Williams Disco pinball machine; 1898 dice popper gambling device; talking 1990s bar top breathalyzer; deadly fishing harpoon.(n)

programme.title: Auction Hunters: Voodoo Moola
programme.desc: Allen & Ton hit a storage auction in Louisiana's Capitol City and quickly find themselves in trouble with the law! The guys uncover a pair of racing lawnmowers and then stumble on an antique barber chair from the early 1900s!(n)

programme.title: Auction Hunters: Half Pipe Dreams
programme.desc: 1970s Z-Flex Jimmy Plumer Poolrider skateboard with artwork by Doug Smith; Kevlar bulletproof vest, ballistic facemask and a helmet used by S.W.A.T. teams; a pair of 1990s racing pocket bikes capable of going 80 mph.(n)

programme.title: Auction Hunters: Reel Money
programme.desc: 1970's-era Fighting Chair used for big-game fishing; military MILES "laser tag" training system.(n)

programme.title: Auction Hunters: The Jersey Score
programme.desc: Ton & Allen attend a silent auction in NJ, but that doesn't stop the local buyers from letting them know they're not welcome! They uncover a skeet throwing machine from the 1960's & a vintage vehicle with some real horsepower!(n)

programme.title: Auction Hunters: Hot Wheels
programme.desc: '70s sand rail dune racer with rally hemi heads; 1965 replica Mustang pool table; off-road racing gear.(n)
